additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: AQUA (WATER/EAU), ALOE BARBADENSIS LEAF JUICE, ISOPROPYL PALMITATE, BIS PEG 18 METHYL ETHER DIMETHYL SILANE, COCOGLYCERIDES, DIHYDROXYACETONE, BUTYROSPERMUM PARKII (SHEA) BUTTER, GLYCERYL STEARATE, POLYACRYLAMIDE, PHENOXYETHANOL, METHYLPARABEN, C13 14 ISOPARAFFIN, TOCOPHERYL ACETATE, ERYTHRULOSE, PARFUM (FRAGRANCE), PROPYLPARABEN, LAURETH-7, CETYL PHOSPHATE, BUTYLPARABEN, ETHYLPARABEN, TRIETHANOLAMINE.

additionalProperty.name: Warning
additionalProperty.value: FOR EXTERNAL USE ONLY. WARNING: This product does not contain a sunscreen and does not protect against sunburn. Repeated exposure of unprotected skin while tanning may increase the risk of skin aging, skin cancer and other harmful effects to the skin even if you do not burn. KEEP OUT OF THE SIGHT AND REACH OF CHILDREN. Carry out a patch test 24 hours prior to use.
